<@ for ver in version.list @> <@ if ver.name != version.latest.name @> <@ if loop.first @> {% if page.versionHref == "<$ ver.href $>" %} <@ else @> {% elsif page.versionHref == "<$ ver.href $>" %} <@ endif @> {% include fluid/api_menu_flat_<$ ver.name $>.html %} <@ endif @> <@ endfor @> <# make the last case always be to show latest version #> {% else %} {% include fluid/api_menu_flat_<$ version.latest.name $>.html %} {% endif %}
